lead_paragraph: An article on Saturday about the Rangers’ 3-2 loss to Pittsburgh in their N.H.L. season opener misstated the time of Evgeni Malkin’s goal for the Penguins. It was 7 minutes 48 seconds into the game, not 8:48.
snippet: An article on Saturday about the Rangers’ 3-2 loss to Pittsburgh in their N.H.L. season opener misstated the time of Evgeni Malkin’s goal for the Penguins. It was 7 minutes 48 seconds into the game, not 8:48.
